name: LabBot
description:
Labbot is a puzzle game prototype where you control a tiny spiderbot thing and go through levels all tiny spiderbot-like.  This was a one week project. We would appreciate your comments, criticisms and suggestions.

Things we would like to add to this game:

  • Cool spiderbot abilities!
  • More tiny robot killing gadgets!
  • Two more spider legs for accuracy!
  • A story!
  • And actual puzzles this time!
